description:
The Power Stretch Pro Pants are lightweight fleeced pants, in a Polartec® Power Stretch Pro® fabric, designed for use as a base or midlayer. The Power Stretch Pro® fabric is highly wind and abrasion-resistant and 4-way stretch allows for excellent levels of freedom of movement.

Features include flatlock low-bulk seams and a moisture wicking elastic waistband. A slim fit ensures comfortable layering use.
name: Rab Power Stretch Pro Pants, Reg - Mens
